text: Swahwilc man swa on sunnandæg oððe on niht acenned bið, orsorglice leofæð he, & bið fægger.
Gif he on monandæg oðþe on niht acenned bið, he bið acweald fram mannum, lewde swa clæroc sweþer he bið.
Gif he on tiwesdæg bið acenned oþðe on ða niht, se bið æwerd on his life, & bið man & ðwære.
Gif he bið on wodnesdeig oþðe on da niht acenned, he bið scarp & biter & swiðe wær on his wordum.
Gif he bið acenned on þurresdæg oþðe on þa niht, he bið swiðe gesibsum & wæleði, & wel geweaxeþ, & he bið God lufiende & eallis fram wifum.

Gif he bið acenned on frigendeg oðþe on ða niht, we bið awerget fam mannum, & he bið disicreafti, & fam allum mannum he bið laþ, & æfre ifel þenceþ on his heortan, & he bið ðeof, & swide ondredende, & he leng ne leofað þonne on midre ilde.
Gif he bið acenned on saternesdæg oþðe on ða niht, his dæde beoð franlica, & he bið ealdorman, swa wewer swa wif swa wære he bið, tæla him gelimpeþ, & lange he leofaþ.
